posts.post_content:
THIS CARD SOLD.

This is a very, very nice example of a T205. Common player, but in a high level condition. Centering is perfect, sharp registry, and the back is clear and bright. Only a bit of chipping on the corners stops it from hitting a higher grade.

I am only selling because I am bidding on the Goldin auction ending this weekend, and need some dry powder. Asking $120 shipped- a very nice deal. [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=178030&d=1423195692[/IMG]
